## Description

Renames a repo 

## Installation

```
gh extension install crguezl/gh-repo-rename
```

## Usage

``` 
Usage: gh-repo-rename [options]

Options:
  -V, --version      output the version number
  -r, --repo <repo>  repository
  -o, --org <org>    org
  -n, --name <name>  name
  -h, --help         display help for command
```
